meanings.definition: A person or thing that adds color to something.
meanings.sent1: The colorizer painted vibrant hues on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: I bought a colorizer to brighten up my living room.
meanings.sent3: The colorizer crayon made the black and white picture look silly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a colorizer, bringing joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The colorizer's magic transformed the dull room into a rainbow paradise.

meanings.definition: A software tool used to change the color of an image or video.
meanings.sent1: I used the colorizer to make the sky blue in the photo.
meanings.sent2: The colorizer app helped me adjust the tones in the video.
meanings.sent3: The colorizer software turned the cat's fur into a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a colorizer, enhancing the beauty of the scene.
meanings.sent5: With a click of the colorizer, the dull picture became vibrant and lively.
